message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $18000. It's a high-quality item that I believe will meet your needs.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. Unfortunately, $18000 is beyond my budget. I can offer $9000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. However, $9000 is significantly lower than what I'm looking to sell the product for. I can lower my price to $17000. I hope we can find some middle ground.
Alice, I truly appreciate your flexibility. However, $17000 is still a bit higher than I can afford. How about we settle at $10000? I believe itâ€™s a fair compromise.
Bob, I understand your position. Let's meet in the middle at $15000. This is a great value for the product and I believe it's a win-win for both of us.
Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, $15000 is still outside my budget constraints. I can go up to $11000. I hope we can make this deal happen.
